channel.title: Host Website on Github on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Host Website on Github on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme

item.title: Create Github Repository
item.description: Create a repository on Github to store your Hugo website files. Sign in to Github Sign up for a GitHub account. If you already have a Github account, just skip this step. Sign in to Github with your uername and password. Create a Repository Click on New repository on the right of the page. Input Erdan101.github.io under Repository name. You must use a <USERNAME>.

item.title: Deploy the Website
item.description: Rebuild the Site Run hugo to rebuild your site. F:\Hugo\Sites\mysite> hugo Start building sites â€¦ | EN | ZH -------------------+----+----- Pages | 84 | 10 Paginator pages | 0 | 0 Non-page files | 21 | 0 Static files | 84 | 84 Processed images | 0 | 0 Aliases | 1 | 0 Sitemaps | 2 | 1 Cleaned | 0 | 0 Total in 590 ms The public/ directory will be generated right away.
